card.name: 38-Amp Ionic Plate
card.property:
While the upgraded character is a [Mercenary] > It has [Pierce 1].
When the upgraded character defends and has an odd amount of damage counters > This has +2 [DEF].

card.name: Abrogate
card.property:
Reveal > As your opponent plays a non-[G] Action.
[When Revealed] > Reveal an Action from your hand that shares one or more battle icons with the played Action. If you do, your opponent returns their Action to their hand and it has no effect.

card.name: Anti-Grav Cell
card.property: When the upgraded character has 3 [ATK] or less and you use its [TAP] ability -> Untap that character and scrap this card.

card.name: Auxiliary Fuel Tank
card.property:
The upgraded character has +2 [HEALTH].
While the upgraded character is a [Titan], [Guardian], or has 18[STARS] or more > It gets an additional +2 [HEALTH].

card.name: Bracing Up
card.property:
[Scrap] > When one of your characters defends.
[When Scrapped] > The defender gets +1 [DEF] until end of turn. This turn, while that character is defending against an enemy that has [Pierce], reduce that enemy's [Pierce] total by 1

card.name: Caring is Sharing!
card.property:
Reveal > If one of your [Junkions] would take enough attack damage to be KO’d.
[When Revealed] > You may scrap any number of Upgrades from your characters. For each Upgrade scrapped this way, repair 2 damage from that [Junkion] before it takes that attack damage. Then put this card into your KO area.

card.name: Cooling of Tensions
card.property: Until end of turn, players can flip more than 2 battle cards each battle.

card.name: Custom Junkion Saddle
card.property:
Put only on non-[Vehicle] [Motorcycles] in alt mode without a [STATION].
While the upgraded character is in alt mode and is a [Motorcycle] > It has the [Vehicle] trait and gets the Junkion Saddle [STATION].

card.name: A Very Cross Examination
card.property: Replace the Repair Bay [STATION] on your Combat Deck with the Interrogation Console [STATION].

card.name: Ashtray, Come to Where the Flavor Is!
card.property:
When you play a card with no battle icons > Each of your characters get [Pierce] 1 until end of turn.
[Drifter]

alternate.name: Ashtray, Come to Where the Flavor Is!
alternate.property:
[Drifter]
When you flip to this mode > For each card in your opponent's scrap pile that has at least three battle icons and [K][G], your opponent chooses of of their characters and does 1 damage to it.

card.name: Dare to Be Stupid!
card.property:
[Reveal] > If one of your [Junkions] with [Bandit] would take attack damage.
[When Revealed] > Instead that character takes damage equal to its [ATK].

card.name: Decelerator Laser
card.property: While this is on an attacking [Junkion] with [Bandit] > The defender has [Bandit]

card.name: Depower-Linx
card.property: If you have a [Ranged] character on the battlefield > Choose an enemy. Do 2 damage to that enemy if it is in combiner mode. Then do 2 damage to that enemy if it is in another mode that is not bot or alt mode.

card.name: Diffraction Sword
card.property:
If the upgraded character would take non-attack damage from an opponent’s card > Instead that character takes that much damage minus 1 and you put a diffraction counter on this.
When this has 2 or more diffraction counters on it > Scrap it.

card.name: Drill Fingers
card.property:
When this is put on a [Specialist] > Do 1 damage to it.
While this is on a [Specialist] > It has +1 [ATK].
[Oppress 1]

card.name: Dual Smokestacks
card.property:
Put on [Boats], [Trains], and [Trucks] only.
When you put this on a character, your opponent chooses one > • Do 1 damage to each enemy. • Do 2 damage to an enemy of your choice.

card.name: Escapology
card.property: One of your characters gets [Bold 1] until end of turn. That character is unaffected by [Oppress] this turn.

card.name: Everything Must Go!
card.property: Choose one of your [Junkions] with [Bandit]. When it attacks this turn while upgraded with a [Junkion] Weapon or a Weapon with no abilities > You may scrap that Weapon after the battle. If you do, do damage to the defender equal to the +[ATK] in that Weapon's stat box.

card.name: Explosive Disposal
card.property:
[Reveal] > When one of your opponent's cards causes a Weapon or Armor to be scrapped from one of their characters.
[When Revealed] > Your opponent puts the scrapped Upgrade into their KO area. Do damage to the character equal to the total of the KO'd Upgrade's +[ATK] and +[DEF] in its stat box.

card.name: Extended Duration Mission
card.property:
Scrap > When one of your characters defends and you reveal a Secret Action.
When Scrapped > At end of battle, scrap that Secret Action. Then play it.

card.name: Alphastrike Counterforce
card.property:
Your starting [STAR] limit increases by 2 if you have a [Weaponizer] on your starting team.
Your starting [STAR] limit increases by 2 if you have a [Battle Master] on your starting team.

card.name: Autobot Infinitus
card.property: [Head] + [Oppress 1]

alternate.name: Autobot Infinitus
alternate.property: [Oppress 1]

card.name: Half-Track Trickery
card.property: Choose one of your characters. If it's a [Truck], flip an enemy in bot or body mode to alt mode. If it's a [Tank], you may scrap an Upgrade from it. If you do, do 2 damage to an enemy.

card.name: Hand of Adaptus
card.property: Draw a card for each character you have on the battlefield in bot mode or body mode that has an alt mode.

card.name: Happy Motoring!
card.property:
[Scrap] > After one of your [Junkions] battles while in a [STATION] of a [Junkion] [Motorcycle].
[When Scrapped] > Untap the character whose [STATION] the attacker was in and flip each of those characters to another mode.

card.name: Head Case
card.property:
Reveal > After your opponent chooses an attacker and before they choose a defender.
[When Revealed] > Choose a [Titan Master] in head mode. Until end of battle, that [Titan Master’s] bonus does not apply to the character it’s on and applies instead to one of your characters.

card.name: Head of State
card.property: When the upgraded character battles and you flip battle cards > If the upgraded character is a Junkion, you may scrap up to 2 cards you flip this battle without using their battle icons. For each card scrapped this way, the upgraded character gets +1 [ATK] and +1 [DEF] until end of turn.

card.name: High Beam Headlights
card.property: Put this on [Vehicle] characters only. After your opponent chooses an attacker and before they choose a defender while the upgraded character is in a Vehicle mode > Choose one: • The upgraded character has [Brave] until end of battle. • The upgraded character has [Stealth] until end of battle.

card.name: Hodgepodge Panoply
card.property: While this is on a defending [Junkion] with [Drifter] -> The attacking character has [Drifter].

card.name: Hot Seat
card.property:
[Scrap] > At the beginning of any turn.
[When Scrapped] > Choose one of your characters in a [STATION]. That character leaves its [STATION].

card.name: Hurry Hurry Hurry!
card.property:
[Reveal] > After your opponent chooses an attacker and before they choose a defender.
[When Revealed] > If you have only [Junkions] and/or characters with a [Motorcycle] mode on the battlefield, until end of turn, when an enemy attacks, your opponent attacks with another one of their untapped characters that has not already attacked this turn.

card.name: Imminent Breakthrough
card.property:
[Scrap] > During the main phase of your turn.
[When Scrapped] > You may play cards as though you played Tech Research this turn.

card.name: Angolmois Infusion
card.property:
When you upgrade one of your [Terrorcons] with Terrorburster Shield > Put an infusion counter on this.
During the main phase of your turn, when this has 3 or more infusion counters and you have 5 Terrorcons in bot mode on the battlefield and/or in your KO area > You may combine your [Terrorcons] into Abominus, Hellsparked Horror.
When your [Terrorcons] combine into Abominus, Hellsparked Horror > Flip this.

alternate.name: Angolmois Infusion
alternate.property:
When you flip to this side > Remove 3 infusion counters from this.
When you put a Terrorburster Shield on your Abominus, Hellsparked Horror > Put an infusion counter on this.
Your Abominus, Hellsparked Horror has +[DEF] equal to the infusion counters on this.

card.name: Autobot Roller, Scout Drone
card.property:
Your Upgrades treat this as though it were named Optimus Prime.
[TAP] > Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Rolling Action, you may play it. Otherwise, put it in your hand.

card.name: Inexorable Force
card.property: While the upgraded character is a [Titan], [Guardian], or has 18 [STARS] or more > It cannot be tapped by the opponent's cards and is unaffected by the opponent's [Oppress].

card.name: Junkyard Turbofox
card.property:
Reveal > As your opponent returns an Upgrade that has 0 [STARS] from their scrap pile or KO area to hand or to the battlefield.
[When Revealed] > Your opponent scraps that Upgrade. You may return an Upgrade that has 0 [STARS] from your scrap pile or KO area to your hand.

card.name: Lagartan Spaulders
card.property:
[Tough 1]
If an opponent's card would cause this to be scrapped from an [Allicon] > You may scrap a [G] card from your hand instead.

card.name: Lie in Wait
card.property:
[Scrap] > When one of your characters defends.
[When Scrapped] > The defender gets [Tough 1] until end of turn.

card.name: Locking it Up
card.property:
[Scrap] > When one of your characters battles.
[When Scrapped] > That character has [Oppress 1] until end of turn.

card.name: Me Grimlock Need New Strategy
card.property: If you have a [Me Grimlock] stratagem and either a Clobber or a [Dinobot] Grimlock on the battlefield > Put a [Me Grimlock] stratagem you own from you KO area or from outside the game onto the battlefield, then put on of your [Me Grimlock] stratagems with the same target on the battlefield into your KO area.

card.name: Mirror Response Mode
card.property: While the upgraded character is battling an enemy that shares one or more traits with it > The upgraded character has +1 [ATK] and +1 [DEF[ for each trait it shares with that enemy.

card.name: Monofiber Filament
card.property:
Put on [Quintessons] [Leaders] or [Quintesson] [Specialists] only.
[Pierce 1]
Up to 3 [Tentacles] can fit in 1 Weapon slot.

card.name: Muster the Will
card.property:
[Scrap] > When one of your characters defends.
[When Scrapped] > The defender gets +2 [DEF] until end of turn. This turn, while that character is defending against an enemy that has [Pierce], reduce that enemy's [Pierce] total by 1.

card.name: Mystical Bond
card.property:
When you play this from hand > You may play a Mystical Bond from your scrap pile.
When the upgraded character battles while in a [STATION] on a [Vehicle] upgraded with Mystical Bond > Repair 1 damage from that [Vehicle] and this character.

card.name: Barrel Rolling
card.property: Your Thundercracker, Mach Warrior has +1 [DEF] for each of your tapped Rolling Actions

card.name: Bug Bite, The Renegade Who Had It Made
card.property: When you flip to this mode > You may scrap an Upgrade from your hand. If you do, return an Upgrade that does not share any colors of battle icons or types as the scrapped card from your scrap pile to hand.

alternate.name: Bug Bite, The Renegade Who Had It Made
alternate.property:
When this does enough attack damage to KO an enemy > Use this card's [Bounty] ability.
[Bounty] > Your opponent chooses a card from their hand and scraps it. If it is an Action, repair 1 damage from one of your characters. If it is an Upgrade, do 1 damage to an enemy.

card.name: Ninety Day Warranty!
card.property:
Reveal > If one of your [Junkions] with [Drifter] would take attack damage.
[When Revealed] > You may distribute that attack damage among any number of your [Junkions].

card.name: Nucleon Exposure
card.property:
Reveal > If an opponent's card would cause one or more of your characters to flip to another mode.
[When Revealed] > Instead you may flip one of your characters to another mode. Your characters cannot be flipped by your opponent's cards this turn.

card.name: Nudge Gun
card.property:
When you put this on a character > You may tap or untap a Rolling Action.
When you put this on a [Specialist] > You may tap or untap a Rolling Action.

card.name: Pack Behavior
card.property:
Put on [Predacons], Seacons, or [Terrorcons] only.
[Bold 1]
[Revenge] > You may put this on one of your other characters.

card.name: Passenger Coverage
card.property:
Reveal > If your character would take attack damage while in a [STATION] on a [Vehicle] character.
[When Revealed] > Instead the [Vehicle] character takes that attack damage minus its base [DEF].

card.name: Patrol Bolas
card.property: When another [Junkion] takes a [STATION] on the upgraded [Junkion] > You may move this to the [Junkion] in that [STATION]. When this is moved from one of your [Junkions] to another of your [Junkions] > Put a spin counter on this. This has +1 [ATK] for each spin counter on it.

card.name: Patrol the Perimeter
card.property:
[Reveal] > When one of your characters defends.
[When Revealed] > That character gets [Tough 2] until end of battle.

card.name: Peas in a Pod!
card.property: Untap a tapped enemy. If an enemy untaps this way, untap one of your tapped [Junkions] that has 10 [STARS] or fewer. If that enemy has 11 [STARS] or more, untap another one of your tapped [Junkions] that has 10 [STARS] or fewer.

card.name: Performance Gear Selector
card.property: When the upgraded character defends and you flip battle cards > If you flipped at least [W][W][W][W], scrap this card. If you didn't, the upgraded character gets +1 [DEF] until end of battle for each [W] you flipped.

card.name: Pile-Up
card.property: Choose a player. Tap all of that player’s Rolling Actions.

card.name: Blockbuster Moving Trailers
card.property: While your Optimus Prime, Autobot Leader is in bot mode > He has [Bold 1] for each character in a [STATIONS] on your Combat Deck.

card.name: Clench, Colossus of Obliteration
card.property:
[Tough 2]
Once per turn, when this defends and you flip battle cards > You may scrap one of your cards flipped this battle without using its icons. When you do, choose a battle icon color on that card. Do damage to the attacker equal to the number of battle icons of the chosen color on the scrapped card.

alternate.name: Clench, Colossus of Obliteration
alternate.property:
[Oppress 2]
When this attacks > You may scrap up to 3 cards from your hand. For each card scrapped this way, this gets +1 [ATK] until end of turn.

card.name: Playing Both Sides
card.property:
Reveal > At the beginning of your opponents turn if you had a [Mercenary] on your starting team.
[When Revealed] > Choose an enemy. Until end of turn, when your opponent plays an Upgrade on the chosen character, choose one: • Draw a card. • Play an Upgrade from your hand.

card.name: Police Action
card.property: Scrap any Rolling Action > It has no effect. Its owner draws a card.

card.name: Razor Wings
card.property: When you put this on a [Melee] character > Do 1 damage to each tapped enemy.

card.name: Reactive Thrusters
card.property:
[Reveal] > When one of your characters defends.
[When Revealed] > Until end of battle, [K] cannot give more [Pierce] than the attacker's base [ATK].

card.name: Recon Reissue
card.property:
[Reveal] > When your character defends.
[When Revealed] > Choose one: • Move an Armor or Utility from one of your characters to another one. • Put a [Battle Master] Armor or Utility from your KO area onto one of your characters.

card.name: Relax With a Cold One!
card.property: Choose one of your [Junkions] with [Drifter]. When the chosen character attacks this turn > Return all of the defenders Weapons and Armors to the opponents hand. Repair 1 damage from the defender.

card.name: Revving Up
card.property:
[Scrap] > When you choose an attacker.
[When Scrapped] > The attacker gets +1 [ATK] and [Pierce 1] until end of turn.

card.name: Riffraff Knick-Knacks
card.property:
When you put this on a [Junkion] > You may play another Riffraff Knick-Knacks.
Up to 3 Riffraff Knick-Knacks can fit in 1 Utility slot.
When the upgraded character is a [Junkion], takes attack damage, and is not KO’d > You may repair 1 damage from the upgraded character and scrap this.

card.name: Severed Combiner Hand
card.property:
While the upgraded character is defending against an enemy that has [Pierce] > Reduce that enemy's [Pierce] total by 1. If that enemy has 17 [STARS] or more, reduce that enemy's [Pierce] total by 3 instead.
While the upgraded character is defending against an enemy that has 17 [STARS] or more > The upgraded character has +2 [DEF]

card.name: Shanix Laundering
card.property: Scrap an Upgrade from one of your characters > If you do, reveal the top two cards of your deck and put them into your hand.

card.name: Boater Suppression
card.property: When on of your characters battles > If you had 3 Tidal Waves on your starting team, you may flip this.

alternate.name: Boater Suppression
alternate.property:
When you flip to this side > Each of your characters has [Oppress] until end of turn equal to 3 minus the number of your characters with 4 [STARS] or fewer on the battlefield.
Flip this when all characters untap.

card.name: Crasher, Fractious Fanatic
card.property: Once per turn when two or more characters simultaneously take non-attack damage from an opponent's card > Choose one: • Repair 1 damage from each of your characters damaged this way. • Do 1 damage to each enemy.

alternate.name: Crasher, Fractious Fanatic
alternate.property: When this does attack damage to a [Melee], [Ranged], or [Specialist] enemy. > Choose one of those traits on the defender. Do 1 damage to up to 2 other enemies that share that trait.

card.name: Shard of the Divine Light
card.property:
When you put this on a character > Repair 1 damage from it.
The upgraded character has +4 [HEALTH].

card.name: Sitrep Update
card.property: If one of your face-down Secret Actions would be scrapped > You may scrap this instead.

card.name: Skimming Off the Top
card.property:
Each player draws a card.
If you had a [Mercenary] or [Junkion] on your starting team > Draw a card.

card.name: Sparring Lessons
card.property: Choose two of your [Autobots]. Do 1 damage to each of them, then repair 2 damage from each of them.

card.name: Spear of the Moment
card.property: When the upgraded character attacks and you flip battle cards > If you flipped at least [W][W][W][W], scrap this card. If you didn't, the upgraded character gets [Pierce 1] until end of battle for each [W] you flipped.

card.name: Spread Democracy!
card.property:
[Scrap] > When one of your [Junkions] with [Bandit] or [Drifter] battles an enemy.
[When Scrapped] > When that enemy attacks, it gets [Drifter] until end of battle. When that enemy defends, it gets [Bandit] until end of battle.

card.name: Summon the Courage
card.property:
[Scrap] > When you choose an attacker.
[When Scrapped] > The attacker gets +2 [ATK] and [Pierce 1] until end of turn.

card.name: Superior Surveillance
card.property:
Play this only if youve played Tech Research this turn.
[Oppress 3]

card.name: Take the Shot
card.property:
[Scrap] > When one of your characters attacks.
[When Scrapped] > The attacker gets [Bold 1] until end of turn.

card.name: Terrorburster Shield
card.property:
Put on [Terrorcons] only.
When the upgraded character defends and you flip at least [O] > The upgraded character can't take more attack damage this battle than the number of [STARS] it has.

card.name: Cat's Cradle of Contingencies
card.property: At the start of your first turn > You may play up to 3 Rolling Actions from your hand. If you do, draw cards equal to the number of Rolling Actions you played and flip this.

alternate.name: Cat's Cradle of Contingencies
alternate.property: Your Megatron, Cybertronian Tyrant gets +1 [ATK] until end of turn for each of your Rolling Actions that untapped this turn.

card.name: Decepticon Wingthing, Loyal, Lethal Cohort
card.property:
[Stealth]
When you flip to this mode > You may move 1 damage counter from one of your characters that have 10 [STARS] or more to another character.

alternate.name: Decepticon Wingthing, Loyal, Lethal Cohort
alternate.property: When a player puts one or more cards from their hand on top of their deck > Your opponent chooses one of their characters and does 1 damage to it. If this has an Upgrade, do 1 damage to an enemy instead.

card.name: Terrorcon Enigma
card.property:
If you have Abominus on the battlefield > Choose an enemy. Your opponent flips it to another mode. If it doesn't flip this way, do 2 damage to it.
If you have 5 [Terrorcons] in bot mode on the battlefield and/or your KO area > Combine them into Abominus, Hellsparked Horror.

card.name: The Power to Bite
card.property:
[Reveal] > When one of your [Sharkticons] or [Allicons] takes enough attack damage to be KO'd.
[When Revealed] > Do damage to the attacker equal to the defender's [ATK] minus the attacker's [DEF].

card.name: Throttle
card.property: Tap one of your untapped [Melee] characters > Tap an untapped enemy character that has the same amount of [HEALTH] or fewer.

card.name: Too Short For This Ride
card.property: If you have a [Ranged] character on the battlefield > Do 1 damage to an enemy. If that enemy is in a [STATION], it leave that [STATION]. Until end of turn, that enemy may not take a [STATION].

card.name: Traffic Checkpoint
card.property:
[Reveal] > At the beginning of your opponent's turn.
[When Revealed] > Choose a player. Tap all of that players Rolling Actions.

card.name: Transfusion Cable
card.property:
Put on [Specialists] only.
When one of your other characters takes attack damage and isn’t KO’d > You may move 1 damage from that character to the upgraded character.
While this is on a non-[Quintesson] > This loses the [Tentacle] trait
Up to 3 [Tentacles] can fit in 1 Weapon slot.

card.name: Tried and Executed
card.property: If it's a [Quintesson] [Specialist], you may play a [Quintesson] Weapon. If it's a [Judge], you may return a [Quintesson] Armor from the scrap pule to your hand.

card.name: Two Foes, Two Fists
card.property:
[Scrap] > When one of your [Titans] or [Guardians], or characters with 18 [STARS] or more does more than enough attack damage to KO an enemy.
[When Scrapped] > Choose a tapped enemy and put the extra damage on it. If that damage is not put on an enemy this way, put that damage on an untapped enemy instead.

card.name: Unfathomable Motives
card.property:
[Reveal] > As your opponent plays an [G] Action.
[When Revealed] > Scrap that Action and it has no effect.

card.name: Detritus, Now With Sleek, Sexy Handling!
card.property:
Your [Road Drones] have [Pierce 1].
When this battles > Choose a [Road Drone] you own from outside the game that doesn't share a name with a character you have on the battlefield or in the KO area and deploy it to the battlefield in alt mode.

alternate.name: Detritus, Now With Sleek, Sexy Handling!
alternate.property: When you flip to this mode > You may play an Upgrade. Then, if you have four different [Road Drones] on the battlefield or in the KO area, you may combine them with this into Roadmaster Prime Mode, Master of Chaos.

card.name: Cherish This World or Perish

property.name: Stratagem Target
property.value: Thunder Guts Gilthor, The One Who Claps

card.property:
When your Stock-Pyl, 100 Billion Stars, One Previous World takes attack damage or an enemy without [Drifter] gets [Drifter] > Put a lightning counter on this.
During the main phase of your turn, when this has at least 4 lightning counters and Gilthor, Wounded Retribution is on the battlefield > You may combine Gilthor and Stock-Pyl into Thunder Guts Gilthor, The One Who Claps.

card.name: Wave of Lightning
card.property:
Do 1 damage to each enemy.
When you have a [Ranged] [Quintesson] on the battlefield > Do 1 damage to each enemy.

card.name: Well-Worn Armor
card.property: The upgraded character has +[DEF] equal to the number of times they have taken non-attack damage this turn.

card.name: Combat Deck
card.property:
If you have Autobot Roller, Scout Drone on your starting team > Your starting [STARS] limit increases by 2.
When all characters untap > You may flip this.

alternate.name: Combat Deck
alternate.property: When all characters untap > You may flip this.

card.name: Gilthor, Wounded Retribution
card.property:
When you play an Upgrade > do 1 damage to this.
Once per turn, when one or more of your characters takes non-attack damage from an opponent's card > You may do damage to an enemy equal to the number of characters that took non-attack damage this turn.

alternate.name: Gilthor, Wounded Retribution
alternate.property:
When you play an Action > Do 1 damage to this.
When an Upgrade with +[ATK] or +[DEF] in its stat box is scrapped from this > This gets that much +[ATK] or +[DEF] until end of turn.

card.name: Greasestain, No Muss! No Fuss!

[Bandit]
When this attacks while in a [STATION] > Do 1 damage to the defender. If the defender is in a [STATION], instead do 2 damage to the defender.

card.name: Don't Touch That Dial!
card.property:
If your starting team is only [Junkions] > Your deck can have up to 1 extra [STARS] of battle cards.
When one of your [Junkions] battles > You may have any [W] icons you flip this battle have no battle effect.

card.name: High Bailiff Bollag, Court Knight
card.property:
[Oppress 1]
This has +1 [ATK] for each Upgrade in the opponent's KO area.

alternate.name: High Bailiff Bollag, Court Knight
alternate.property: When an enemy is upgraded with a Weapon > The upgraded enemy gets -2 [ATK] until end of turn.

card.name: Extermination Exercise
card.property: When one of your characters in a Combat Deck [STATION] battles an enemy of the same faction > If you have Optimus Prime, Dark Awakening on the battlefield, your character gets +1 [ATK] and +1 [DEF] until end of battle and that enemy gets -1 [ATK] and -1 [DEF] until end of battle.

card.name: Junker Drone
card.property:
This can't be on your starting team. This being KO'd doesn't cause abilities of your characters to trigger.
When this is deployed or returns to the battlefield > Scrap one of your Upgrades. If you do, repair 2 damage from the character it was upgrading.

card.name: Four the Selectors!
card.property:
Your Decepticon Doublecrosser, Shield Brothers has [Horde 2].
Your starting [STARS] limit increases by 2 if you have two Decepticon Doublecrosser, Shield Brothers on your starting team.

card.name: Junkheap, Wrecked to Ruin! Keeps on Doin'!
card.property:
When this defends > Each player can't flip more than 4 battle cards during this battle.
[Drifter]

alternate.name: Junkyard, Wrecked to Ruin! Keeps on Doin'!
alternate.property:
[Drifter]
When this defends and your opponent flips battle cards > You may have your opponent scrap one of the cards of your choice they flip this battle without using its battle icons. Once per turn, when a card is scrapped this way, choose a battle icon color on the scrapped card and repair damage from this equal to the number of battle icons of that color on that card after the battle.

card.name: Heroic Perseverance
card.property:
If your starting team is all [Autobots] > Your deck can have up to 1 extra [STARS] of battle cards.
If one of your damaged [Autobots] with [Safeguard] would take attack damage > It takes that much attack damage minus 1 instead.

card.name: Junkion Nancy, Just Say No to Sparkplugs!
card.property:
Each of your characters with a Motorcycle mode has [Focus 1].
[Drifter]

alternate.name: Junkion Nancy, Just Say No to Sparkplugs!
alternate.property:
[Drifter]
Once per turn, when this leaves a [STATION] > If this has 3 or more damage counters, repair 1 damage from each of your characters. Otherwise, do 1 damage to an enemy.

card.name: Ignore the Pain
card.property:
When your Sharkticon Chomp, Craven Carnivore would take attack damage and isnt KO'd > If Sharkticon Chomp was your only [Sharkticon] on your starting team and this has no damage counters on it, you may move all the damage from Sharkticon Chomp to this. Otherwise, if this has damage counters on it, move those damage counters to your Sharkticon Chomp.
When all characters untap > If this has any damage counters on it, flip this.

card.name: Lord Kledji, Royal Ruler of Quintessa
card.property: [TAP] Choose one: • Scrap a [G] card from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards. • Scrap a [G] card from your hand. If you do, move up to 2 damage counters from a character to another character. • Scrap a [G] card from your hand. If you do, scrap an enemy upgrade.

card.name: It's As Good As Used!

property.name: Stratagem Target
property.value: Junkheap, Wrecked to Ruin, Keeps On Doin'!

card.property: When an opponent's card scraps one or more Upgrades from one of your characters while you have Junkheap, Wrecked to Ruin, Keeps On Doin'! on the battlefield > You may reveal two or more Upgrades from your hand. If you do, your opponent chooses one of those Upgrades and you play it onto that character.

card.name: Loudmouth, Incendiary Control
card.property: Once per turn, when an Upgrade is scrapped from one of your characters > You may put that Upgrade into your KO area. If you do, return an Upgrade with the same name as the KO'd Upgrade from the scrap pile to your hand.

alternate.name: Loudmouth, Incendiary Control
alternate.property: Once per turn, when an Action would be scrapped from your played area and wasn't flipped in battle > You may put that Action into your KO area. If you do, return an Action with the same name as the KO'd Action from the scrap pile to your hand.

card.name: I've Got Your Back
card.property: When one of your characters defends while all your characters are tapped > If you had only two characters on your starting team, you may untap one of your other characters after this battle. If you do, flip this.

card.name: Megatron, Megalomaniacal Mariner
card.property:
This has +1 [HEALTH] for each [Allicon] and/or [Sharkticon] in your KO area.
When one of your other [Allicons] or [Sharkticons] attacks > You may do 1 damage to it. If you do, it gets +1 [ATK] until end of turn.

alternate.name: Megatron, Megalomaniacal Mariner
alternate.property:
This has +1 [HEALTH] for each [Allicon] or [Sharkticon] in your KO area.
When you flip to this mode > You may do 2 damage to one of your other [Allicons] or [Sharkticons]. If you do, reveal 2 cards from the top of your deck. Play one of the cards you revealed.

card.name: Kakistocracy
card.property:
If your starting team is only [Quintessons] > Your deck can have up to 1 extra [STARS] of battle cards.
Once per turn during your main phase, if you have a [Quintesson] [Leader] on the battlefield, you may do 1 damage to one of your [Quintesson] [Melee] characters. If you do, choose one:
• That [Quintesson] [Melee] character leaves its [STATION]. • Tap or untap one of your Rolling Actions.

card.name: Muck Sergeant Peck, Brackish Chain-Breaker
card.property:
Your starting team cannot include another [Quintesson] with a printed [Leader] trait.
Your [Quintesson] [Sharkticons] with 4[STARS] have +2 [HEALTH].
When one of your [Sharkticons] or [Allicons] takes attack damage > You may play a Rolling Action.

alternate.name: Muck Sergeant Peck, Brackish Chain-Breaker
alternate.property:
Your [Quintesson] [Sharkticons] with 4[STARS] have +2 [HEALTH].
When one of your other [Sharkticons] or [Allicons] does attack damage > You may move up to 2 damage counters from this to the attacker or vice versa, but not enough to KO either characters.

card.name: King of Pain
card.property:
Remove the text “on one of your characters” on your Scorpulator, Desert Rose.
When your Scorpulator, Desert Rose is KO’d and you play his Upgrade sides > Flip this.

alternate.name: King of Pain
alternate.property:
Your Q-PTP Aculear Scope has +1 [ATK]. Your Q-RTR Arachnoid Array has +1 [DEF].
Replace “[Constructicon]” with “character” on your Q-PTP Aculear Scope. Remove the text “If the upgraded character is a [Constructicon]” on your Q-RTR Arachnoid Array.

card.name: Q-PTP Aculear Scope
card.property:
Play this only with Q-RTR Arachnoid Array. They start the game assembled as Scorpulator.
While the upgraded [Constructicon] has only 1 Weapon slot > Up to one additional Weapon can fit in this slot.

card.name: Materiel War
card.property:
If your starting team is all Decepticons > Your deck can have up to 1 extra [STARS] of battle cards.
Once per turn, when an opponents card causes an Upgrade to be scrapped from one of your [Decepticons] with a Revenge ability > You may scrap an enemy Upgrade.

card.name: Me Grimlock Kick Butt!
card.property: When one of your [Dinobots] attacks a damaged enemy with 17 [STARS] or more while your Grimlock, Dinobot Leader is on the battlefield > Flip this.

alternate.name: Me Grimlock Kick Butt!
alternate.property:
Your [Dinobots] have +1 [DEF]. Enemies with 17 [STARS]or more have -1 [DEF].
When an enemy with 17 [STARS] or more attacks -> Flip this after the battle.

card.name: Q-RTR Arachnoid Array
card.property:
Play this only with Q-PTP Aculear Scope. They start the game assembled as Scorpulator.
The upgraded character has [Brave] while tapped.
[Revenge] > If the upgraded character is a [Constructicon], you may put this on one of your other characters.

card.name: Me Grimlock King!
card.property: Replace the text "One of your [Dinobots]" on your Grimlock, Dinobot Leader with "This or one of your [Quintesson] [Melee] characters".

card.name: Quig
card.property: [Head] + While this is defending against an enemy that has Pierce > Reduce that enemy's [Pierce] total by 2.

alternate.name: Quig
alternate.property: While this is defending against an enemy that has Pierce > Reduce that enemy's [Pierce] total by 2.

card.name: Me Grimlock Mash Brains!
card.property: When your Grimlock, Dinobot Leader attacks a [Specialist] > Your opponent chooses a number of cards from their hand equal to the number of [Dinobots] you have on the battlefield and reveals them. You scrap one of them.

card.name: Rum-Maj, Wreck-Gar Sold Separately!
card.property:
Each of your characters has [Oppress 1].
[Bandit]

alternate.name: Rum-Maj, Wreck-Gar Sold Separately!
alternate.property:
[Bandit]
When one of your characters attacks and you flip 4 or fewer battle cards > It gets [Pierce 1] until of battle. If you flipped 2 or fewer battle cards this battle, it gets an additional +1 [ATK].

card.name: Me Grimlock Say Execute Them!
card.property: When one of your other characters attacks a damaged enemy while your Grimlock, Dinobot Leader is on the battlefield > That enemy gets -1 [HEALTH] and -1 [DEF] until end of battle.

card.name: Scrapheap, It's Not Trash If It's Worth Cash!
card.property:
While one of your characters battles > Your Weapons with no abilities give an additional +1 [ATK]. Your Armors with no abilities give an additional +1 [DEF].
[Bandit]

alternate.name: Scrapheap, It's Not Trash If It's Worth Cash!
alternate.property:
[Bandit]
When this attacks > You may scrap an Upgrade with no abilities on this after the battle. If you do, play an Upgrade with a different name with no abilities on this from your scrap pile.

card.name: Me Grimlock Want to Munch Metal
card.property: Replace the text "[Bold 3]" on Grimlock, Dinobot Leader with "[Pierce 3]".

alternate.name: Me Grimlock Want to Munch Metal

card.name: Scrapper Drone
card.property:
This can't be on your starting team.
This being KO'd doesn't cause abilities of your characters to trigger.
When this deploys or returns to the battlefield > Your opponent chooses one of their Upgrades and scraps it.

card.name: No Lords, No Masters
card.property:
At the start of the first turn > Put this onto one of your [Sharkticons] or [Allicons] other than Muck Sergeant Peck, Brackish Chain-Breaker.
While this is on a character > That character has the [Leader] trait.
When the character this is on is KO'd > Put this into your KO area.

card.name: Sentinel Prime, Legacy of the Primes
card.property: While this has [Oppress] > Your other characters have [Oppress 1].

alternate.name: Sentinel Prime, Legacy of the Primes
alternate.property: While this has [Oppress] > Increase his [Oppress] total by 2.

alternate.name: Sentinel Prime, Legacy of the Primes
alternate.property: When you flip to this mode > You may deploy a [Titan Master] in head mode on this to the battlefield in bot mode. Then, one of your [Titan Masters] gets +1 [ATK] and [Pierce 2] until end of turn.

card.name: Old War Stories
card.property:
At the end of your turn > If you did not play a Weapon this turn put a story counter on this.
When all characters untap > If you have Sergeant Kup, Veteran Sergeant and at least one other character on the battlefield, you may remove a number of story counters from this equal to the number of characters you have on the battlefield. If you do, repair 1 damage from each of your characters and you may play a Weapon on each of them.

card.name: Sideswipe, Covert Clone
card.property:
While this is attacking an enemy with [Brave] or [Stealth] > He gets +2 [ATK] and [Pierce 1].
If an opponent's card would cause an Upgrade to be scrapped from this > Instead you may scrap a different Upgrde from this.

alternate.name: Sideswipe, Covert Clone
alternate.property:
This has +[ATK] equal to the highest +[ATK] in the stat box of a [Battle Master] or [Weaponizer] Upgrade in your KO area.
This has +[DEF] equal to the highest +[DEF] in the stat box of a [Battle Master] or [Weaponizer] Upgrade in your KO area.

card.name: Order in the Court
card.property: When you use a [TAP] ability of one of your characters or when one of your [Quintesson] [Specalists] becomes tapped > You may flip this.

alternate.name: Order in the Court
alternate.property:
Your High Bailiff Bollag, Court Knight has [Brave].
When all characters untap > Flip this.

card.name: Sinnertwin, Two-Faced Disgrace
card.property: As your opponent plays an Upgrade > If you had at least 2 [Terrorcons] on your starting team, you may reveal two Upgrades that share a type with the opponent's Upgrade from your hand and scrap one of them. If you do, your opponent returns that Upgrade to their hand and you flip this.

alternate.name: Sinnertwin, Two-Faced Disgrace
alternate.property: When this does attack damage to an enemy > Do 1 damage to another enemy.

card.name: Prosecutorial Overreach
card.property: Once per turn, when you put a [Tentacle] on your Inquisitor Drebzik, Exhaustive Interrogator > You may play another [Tentacle] onto him.

card.name: Solarbot, Enigmatic Sunsteader
card.property:
This has [Stealth] and -1 [DEF] while untapped.
This has [Brave] and +1 [DEF] while tapped.

alternate.name: Solarbot, Enigmatic Sunsteader
alternate.property: When this attacks > This gets +2 [ATK] until end of battle if one or more character cards are under the defender, a character is on the defender in head mode, or a character is in one of the defender's [STATION]. Then this gets +1 [ATK] until end of battle for each battle card under the defender.

card.name: Put a Stinger in the Works
card.property:
Before the game begins, if your starting team was all [Constructicons] > Deploy a Scorpulator, Desert Rose you own from outside the game to the battlefield in bot mode.
At the start of the game > KO one of your characters other than Scorpulator, Desert Rose.

alternate.name: Put a Stinger in the Works

card.name: Soundbarrier, Grudging Foot Soldier Support
card.property: When an enemy attacks and your opponent flips battle cards > Until end of battle, [K] cannot give more than [Pierce 3].

alternate.name: CY-47 Bridge Bulwark
alternate.property:
At the start of each turn > The upgraded character gets [Tough 2] until end of turn.
If this would leave the battlefield > Put it into your KO area instead.

card.name: Queen of the Junkyard
card.property:
At the end of your turn > If your deck and scrap pile have 50 or fewer total cards, put a junk counter on this.
Your Rum-Maj, Wreck-Gar Sold Separately! has +[ATK] equal to the number of junk counters on this.
When you reshuffle your deck > Remove all junk counters from this.

card.name: Stock-Pyl, 100 Billion Stars, One Precious World
card.property:
[Drifter]
If one of your characters that has exactly 4 or 5 [STARS] would take attack damage > If you had no other characters on your starting team that have exactly 4 or 5 [STARS], instead you may have this take up to half that attack damage, rounded down, and your other character take the rest.

alternate.name: Stock-Pyl, 100 Billion Stars, One Precious World
alternate.property:
[Drifter]
Once per turn, when this character takes 4 or more damage and isn't KO'd > You may move half that damage, rounded down, from this to the attacker.

card.name: Scrappy Spotlight
card.property: If your starting team is only Junkions > Your deck can have up to 2 extra [STARS] of [W] cards.

card.name: Terrorcon Blot, Rank and Vile Rank and File
card.property: As your opponent plays a non-[G] Action that is not a Secret Action > If you had at least 2 [Terrorcons] on your starting team, you may reveal two Actions that aren't Secret Actions from your hand and scrap one of them. If you do, your opponent returns that Action to their hand and it has no effect. Then you flip this.

alternate.name: Terrorcon Blot, Rank and Vile Rank and File
alternate.property: If one of your damaged [Terrorcons] that has exactly 4 [STARS] would take non-attack damage from an opponent's card > Instead it takes that much damage minus 1.

card.name: Slice, Dice, and Julienne!

property.name: Stratagem Target
property.value: Detritus, Now With Sleek, Sexy Handling!

card.property: When your opponent draws one or more cards during your turn and your Detritus, Now With Sleek, Sexy Handling! is on the battlefield > Your [Road Drones] get +1[ATK] until end of turn.

card.name: Terrorcon Cutthroat, Shock and Cawww
card.property: When you flip to this mode > If you had at least 2 other [Terrorcons] on your starting team, you may reveal 2 Secret Actions from your hand and scrap one of them. If you do, your opponent chooses one of their face-down Secret Actions and returns it to their hand.

alternate.name: Terrorcon Cutthroat, Shock and Cawww
alternate.property: When one of your [Terrorcons] is KO'd > Untap one of your [Terrorcons] that has exactly 4 [STARS].

card.name: Sonic Doom
card.property:
Your Dirge, Doombringer has +2 [ATK] while in bot mode.
When your Dirge, Doombringer attacks for the first time each turn > Remove the text "without doing extra damage" from the bot mode of your Dirge, Doombringer until end of battle.

card.name: Terrorcon Hun-Gurrr, Eaters Digest
card.property: When you flip to this mode > Do 1 damage to one of your other characters. If you do, choose one: • Do 1 damage to an enemy. • Repair 2 damage from one of your other [Terrorcons] that wasn't damaged this way.

alternate.name: Terrorcon Hun-Gurrr, Eaters Digest
alternate.property:
At the start of your turn > You may scrap a card. If you do, draw a card.
When this defends while upgraded and you flip at least [O] > This gets +1 [DEF] until end of battle for each [O] you flip this battle, up to +5 [DEF].

card.name: Spin to Deflect Stuff
card.property: If one of your [Helicopters] would take non-attack damage from an opponent's card > Instead it takes that much damage minus 1. Then do 1 damage to an enemy.

card.name: Terrorcon Rippersnapper, Tooth and Nail
card.property: When you flip to this mode while this is untapped > You may tap this and an enemy with 6 [STARS] or fewer. If you do and the enemy has [Stealth] or [Stealth] while untapped, do 1 damage to that enemy.

alternate.name: Terrorcon Rippersnapper, Tooth and Nail
alternate.property: When this attacks an enemy that doesn't have [Tough] > Until end of battle, the defender gets -[DEF] equal to the number of Actions and Upgrades you played this turn.

card.name: Stop the Tax and Spend!

property.name: Stratagem Target
property.value: Junkion Nancy, Just Say No to Sparkplugs!

card.property: If an opponent's character would cause you to scrap 2 or more cards from the top of your deck while you have Junkion Nancy, Just Say No to Sparkplugs! on the battlefield > Instead you may scrap only the top card of your deck.

card.name: Trasher Drone
card.property:
This can't be on your starting team.
This being KO'd doesn't cause abilities of your characters to trigger.
When this is deployed or returns to the battlefield > Put an Upgrade that has exactly 0 [STARS] from the opponents scrap pile into their KO area.

card.name: The City's Finest Views
card.property:
Your [Titans] have the Observation Deck [STATION].
At the start of the first turn > Reveal your hand.

card.name: Tread Bolt, Devil of the Deep Blue Sky
card.property:
This has [Stealth] against [Decepticons].
When you flip to this mode > Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put an Action from among them into your hand. You may put any number of the remaining cards on top of your deck in any order. Scrap the rest of the cards revealed this way.

alternate.name: Tread Bolt, Devil of the Deep Blue Sky
alternate.property:
When you reshuffle your scrap pile into your deck > Put the bottom card of your deck face down under this.
When this attacks > Do 2 damage to the defender for each card under this.

card.name: The Great Escape
card.property:
Once per game, when one of your characters with a [Motorcycle] mode takes attack damage and isn't KO'd > You may move all damage counters from that character to this. If you do, KO that character.
At the start of your turn > You may return a character with a [Motorcycle] mode KO'd by this stratagem to the battlefield fully repaired.
When that character returns to the battlefield from the KO area > Move all damage counters from this to that character and flip this.

card.name: Waster Drone
card.property:
This can't be on your starting team.
This being KO'd doesn't cause abilities of your characters to trigger.
When this deploys or returns to the battlefield > Move an Upgrade from an enemy to another enemy.

card.name: Third Party Brigade
card.property:
Before the game begins, if your starting team was all [Combaticons] > Deploy a Shockblast, Galactic Man you own from outside the game to the battlefield in alt mode.
When one of your [Combaticons] attack and you flip battle cards > Scrap the first [K] card you flip without using its battle icons.

card.name: Wreck-Gar, The Big Cheese! Now With More Cheese!

property.name: Traits
property.value: Autobot, Leader, Vehicle, Motorcycle, Melee, Station

card.property:
Each of your other [Autobots] and [Junkions] has +1 [HEALTH].
While this has a [Bold] or [Tough] Upgrade > He has [Bold 1] and [Tough 1].

alternate.name: Wreck-Gar, The Big Cheese! Now With More Cheese!
alternate.property:
Each of your other [Autobots] and [Junkions] has +1 [HEALTH].
While this has a [Bandit] Upgrade > This has [Bandit] and +1 [DEF].
While this has a [Drifter] Upgrade > This has [Drifter] and +1 [ATK].

card.name: This Shall Be Your Ship
card.property:
When each of the following events have happened > Flip this.
1. Welcome Megatron - You play an Upgrade onto a character that shares a faction with that Upgrade, and an action of that same faction in the game turn
2. I am Unicron - One of your [Leaders] was KOd by damage.
3. I have summoned you here for a purpose - All characters untap
4. This is my command - One of your characters is upgraded with a Utility that has two or more battle icons
5. Proceed on your way to oblivion - One of your characters attacked while upgraded with two or more types of Upgrades.

alternate.name: This Shall Be Your Ship
alternate.property: When you flip to this side > Return one of your KOd [Leaders] that was on your starting team to the battlefield and repair 3 damage from it.

card.name: Time for New Leadership
card.property: At the start of your opponent’s turn, while your Deadlock, Bounty Hunter is in bot mode > Choose a character. If it’s KO’d this turn, repair 3 damage from one of your characters.

card.name: Writhing in the Deep
card.property: At the start of your turn while your Megatron, Megalomaniacal Mariner is on the battlefield > If one or more of your [Sharkticons] or [Allicons] were KO'd during the previous turn, you may scrap up to that many [G] cards from your hand. For each card scrapped this way, return one of those [Sharkticons] or [Allicons] from your KO area to the battlefield and repair 1 damage from each of them. At the end of turn, KO each character returned this way.

card.name: Abominus, Hellsparked Horror
card.property:
This has [Bold] and [Pierce] equal to the number of types of Upgrades on this.
When this is combined > You may have your opponent flip each of their characters to another mode. Do 2 damage to each enemy your opponent can't flip this way.

card.name: Roadmaster Prime Mode, Master of Chaos
card.property:
When this is combined > Each player scraps all cards from their hands. Each player draws a card for each card the other player scrapped this way.
When this is KO'd > For each Upgrade on this, deploy a [Road Drone] that was combined with this to the battlefield in alt mode, even if you have no other characters.

card.name: Scorpulator, Desert Rose
card.property: When this does attack damage to an enemy > Choose a trait on one of your characters. Do 1 damage to EACH character with that trait.

card.name: Thunder Guts Gilthor, The One Who Claps

property.name: Traits
property.value: Junkion, Vehicle, Tank, Truck, Ranged, Station

card.property:
[Pierce 4]
When this does an odd amount of attack damage to an enemy > Do 1 damage to each enemy.
When this is combined > Repair up to 10 damage from one of your other characters.
